title: Bad Boy Lyrics Alex Pandian Songs Lyrics

Movie: Alex Pandian

am a Bad Bad Bad Bad Boy

seo.description: Get the complete Bad Boy Lyrics Alex Pandian Songs Lyrics from Alex Pandian. Read the lyrics penned by Karunakaran and composed by Devi Sri Prasad(DSP) and sung by Baba Sehgal. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
